DataElement.preferredName: Transition Owner Social Role User Social Role PersonRole
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A change from one state or stage to another.:One with an interest in, dominion of, or control over an object or property.:The action or activity assigned to or required or expected of a person or group._An individual who uses a computer, program, network, or related service for work or entertainment.:The action or activity assigned to or required or expected of a person or group._The caAERS role name of a person.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A change from one state or stage to another.:One with an interest in, dominion of, or control over an object or property.:The action or activity assigned to or required or expected of a person or group.

Concepts.definition: A change from one state or stage to another.
One with an interest in, dominion of, or control over an object or property.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The caAERS role name of a person.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An investigator designated to a specific study location.:An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.

Concepts.definition: An investigator designated to a specific study location.
An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An investigator designated to a specific study location.

Concepts.definition: An investigator designated to a specific study location.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.

Concepts.definition: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: 02/08/2007 - Updated with NCI Thesaurus definition.  Former definition recorded as a alternate definition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A living person who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, and/or treated in the course of a clinical trial.  This includes studies where an investigator obtains identifiable private information or data through the intervention or interaction with the individual.:A person responsible for organizing multiple events or efforts into a smaller number of tasks.

Concepts.definition: A living person who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, and/or treated in the course of a clinical study.  This includes studies where an investigator obtains identifiable private information or data through the intervention or interaction with the individual.
A person responsible for organizing multiple events or efforts into a smaller number of tasks.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who handles most of the administrative responsibilities of a clinical study, acts as liaison between investigative site and sponsor, and reviews all data and records before a monitor's visit.

Concepts.definition: A person who handles most of the administrative responsibilities of a clinical study, acts as liaison between investigative site and sponsor, and reviews all data and records before a monitor's visit.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A designated person who is trained and responsible for coordinating adverse event review, tracking, surveillance and reporting activities within a clinical institution or clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A designated person who is trained and responsible for coordinating adverse event review, tracking, surveillance and reporting activities within a clinical institution or clinical trial.
A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Somebody who makes a report of any kind, e.g. a person who is authorized to gather and give a formal or official account or description of findings, events, issues and other information regarding clinical study, drug adverse effect, preclinical research results, data and safety monitoring, etc. to appropriate agency or institution.

Concepts.definition: Somebody who makes a report of any kind, e.g. a person who is authorized to gather and give a formal or official account or description of findings, events, issues and other information regarding clinical study, drug adverse effect, preclinical research results, data and safety monitoring, etc. to appropriate agency or institution.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/13/12 - Released as part of caAERS v2.0 model cleanup; VD associated with CS/CSI.  jc
